Serene Garden at Gardens by the bay is a unique horticultural garden inspired by the minimalist concept of Japanese zen gardens.
I love how quiet and peaceful it is, itâ€™s perfect if you want a break from the hustle and bustle of the city and just enjoy nature.

Nice Chinese/Japanese style gardens. Didn't know of this place until recently. A relaxing place to walk through on a cooling day to pretend I am on holiday elsewhere. May be hot on sunny days though. There isn't as much tree cover.
